abstract: Byron D. Trott, an adviser to Warren E. Buffett and a former Goldman Sachs vice chairman, detailed how Mr. Buffett’s investment in Goldman came about.
snippet: Byron D. Trott, an adviser to Warren E. Buffett and a former Goldman Sachs vice chairman, detailed how Mr. Buffett’s investment in Goldman came about.
lead_paragraph: Byron D. Trott has spent a career carefully cultivating the image of the discreet investment banker, a behind-the-scenes consigliere to some of America’s wealthiest businessmen, including his star client, Warren E. Buffett. At Goldman Sachs, Mr. Trott was so vigilant about guarding clients’ confidences that he was known to fire underlings who discussed private matters in the bank’s elevators.

headline.main: Buffett’s Goldman Deal Is Topic in an Insider Case
